name: 倪至寬
objective:
The topics of this independent study includes following items:
1. pipe jacking or trenchless construction related works
2. underground excavation technology
3. underground grouting technology
schedule:
Midterm report is expected at the end of first semester.
Final report and power point are expected at the end of the second semester.
materials: students are required to down load the necessary reference from internet and various journal publications to study and come up with his or her final report.

name: 陳孝行
objective: 訓練同學研究、分析之能力與興趣之訓練與培養，並使同學從課程中了解研究計劃案產生過程及架構，針對土木工程發展及土木業者的實際需要，就個人興趣進行專題研究工作，並提出心得報告。

name: 魏敏樺
objective:
訓練同學研究、分析之能力與興趣之訓練與培養，並使同學從課程中了解研究計劃案產生過程及架構，針對土木工程發展及土木業者的實際需要，就個人興趣進行專題研究工作，並提出心得報告。
This course is designed to allow students to work on a practical research in civil engineering under the guidence of a supervisor. Throughout the course, the students are expected to learn  solution methods to the practical problem he/she is undertaking.
schedule: Weekly meeting with their respective supervisor.
